column1: 254418,Registered Nurse (Medical),,"Monitor medical facility activities to ensure adherence to standards or regulations
column3: Monitor patient progress or responses to treatments
column5: Analyse patient data to determine patient needs or treatment goals
column9: Collect medical information from patients, family members or other medical professionals
column11: Evaluate patient functioning, capabilities or health
column13: Inform medical professionals regarding patient conditions and care
column15: Communicate detailed medical information to patients or family members
column19: Collaborate with health care professionals to plan or provide treatment
column21: Monitor patient conditions during treatments, procedures or activities
column23: Prepare reports summarising patient diagnostic or care activities
column25: Administer anaesthetics or sedatives to control pain
column29: Treat acute illnesses, infections or injuries
column31: Operate diagnostic or therapeutic medical instruments or equipment
column37: Administer health care or medical treatments
column41: Maintain inventory of medical supplies or equipment
column43: Examine medical instruments or equipment to ensure proper operation
column45: Prepare medical supplies or equipment for use
column47: Examine patients to assess general physical condition
column51: Administer blood or other fluids intravenously
column59: Advise others on health care issues
column63: Conduct research to increase knowledge about medical issues
